query: SELECT p.id, p.customerId, c.email, p.amount, p.status, p.txid, p.qrCode, p.paidAt, p.createdAt FROM pix_transactions p LEFT JOIN customers c ON p.customerId = c.id ORDER BY p.createdAt DESC LIMIT 5
